title: Carlos Rodriguez Stays Put: Ineos Grenadiers Isn’t Letting Spain’s Top Tour de France Hope Slip Away
content:
The UK super team is betting that the 21-year-old Spanish talent will raise to the occasion to take on Jumbo-Visma and UAE Team Emirates in the quest for the yellow jersey.

Read the full article at Carlos Rodriguez Stays Put: Ineos Grenadiers Isn’t Letting Spain’s Top Tour de France Hope Slip Away on Velo.
author: ahood
